widgets.title: Revenue Now!
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(BookingRevenue) FROM Transaction SINCE 1 hour ago COMPARE WITH 1 hour ago

widgets.title: Revenue This Hour
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(BookingRevenue) FROM Transaction SINCE 1 hour ago FACET BookingHotelName LIMIT 6

widgets.title: Most Popular This Hour
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction FACET  BookingHotelName LIMIT 6 since 1 hour ago

widgets.title: Today's Bookings Revenue
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(BookingRevenue) FROM Transaction SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago

widgets.title: Today's Top Revenue Hotels
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(BookingRevenue) FROM Transaction SINCE 1 day ago FACET BookingHotelName LIMIT 6

widgets.title: Today's Best Selling Hotels
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction FACET  BookingHotelName LIMIT 6 since 1 day ago

widgets.title: This Week's Best Selling Cities
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction FACET  BookingCity since 1 week ago limit 6

widgets.title: This Week's top Agents
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction FACET BookingAgent since 1 day ago limit 5

widgets.title: This Week's Top Searches
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction FACET  searchCriteria LIMIT 10 since 1 week ago

widgets.title: Smoking Preference
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction FACET  BookingSmokingRoom since 1 week ago

widgets.title: How many Beds?
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction FACET  BookingNumberOfBeds since 1 week ago

widgets.title: Revenue by Zip Code
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(BookingRevenue) FROM Transaction SINCE 1 day ago FACET BookingZip LIMIT 6
